IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: RIVERVIEW SCHOOL, AN INDEPENDENT COEDUCATIONAL BOARDING/DAY SCHOOL, PROVIDES A CARING COMMUNITY FOR ADOLESCENTS AND YOUNG ADULTS WITH COMPLEX LANGUAGE, LEARNING AND COGNITIVE DISABILITIES. THE SCHOOL IS COMMITTED TO DEVELOPING STUDENT COMPETENCE AND CONFIDENCE IN ACADEMIC, SOCIAL AND INDEPENDENT LIVING SKILLS.
IRS990.MissionDesc: RIVERVIEW SCHOOL, AN INDEPENDENT COEDUCATIONAL BOARDING/DAY SCHOOL, PROVIDES A CARING COMMUNITY FOR ADOLESCENTS AND YOUNG ADULTS WITH COMPLEX LANGUAGE, LEARNING AND COGNITIVE DISABILITIES. THE SCHOOL IS COMMITTED TO DEVELOPING STUDENT COMPETENCE AND CONFIDENCE IN ACADEMIC, SOCIAL AND INDEPENDENT LIVING SKILLS.
IRS990.Desc: RESIDENTIAL/DAY TREATMENT AND EDUCATION FOR LEARNING DISABLED ADOLESCENTS AND ADULTS.

ProgSrvcAccomActy2Grp.Desc: RESIDENTIAL AND WORK EXPERIENCE FOR LEARNING DISABLED ADULTS.

ProgSrvcAccomActy3Grp.Desc: RESIDENTIAL/DAY SUMMER PROGRAM FOR LEARNING DISABLED ADOLESCENTS AND ADULTS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION HOLDS CUSTODIAL FUNDS ON BEHALF OF THEIR CLIENTS. THESE FUNDS ARE HELD FOR THE CLIENTS' INDIVIDUAL PERSONAL NEEDS.
THE ORGANIZATION'S ENDOWMENT FUNDS ARE MAINTAINED TO FURTHER ENHANCE THE MISSION OF THE ORGANIZATION AND PROVIDE LONG-TERM STABILITY.
THROUGH ADVERTISEMENTS IN TRADE PUBLICATIONS, SCHOOL ASSOCIATIONS, AND NATIONAL ACCREDITATION BOOKLETS AND MATERIALS.

RIVERVIEW SCHOOL, INC. IS A PRIVATE RESIDENTIAL/DAY SCHOOL APPROVED BY THE COMMONWEALTH OF MASSACHUSETTS DEPARTMENT OF ELEMENTARY AND SECONDARY EDUCATION AND RECEIVES FUNDING FROM VARIOUS STATE AGENCIES AND CITIES AND TOWNS BOTH WITHIN AND OUTSIDE MASSACHUSETTS.
FINANCIAL AID IS AVAILABLE TO FAMILIES WITH A DEMONSTRATED FINANCIAL NEED.

TaxExemptBondsIssuesGrp.PurposeDesc: REFINANCE EXISTING TERM LOAN AND CAPTIAL IMPROVEMENTS TO CAMPUS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE SCHOOL UTILIZES THE SERVICES OF TD BANK TO SELL DONATED STOCK.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 2
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: TRUSTEES EDWARD MULLER AND PATRICIA BAUER ARE MARRIED. TRUSTEES RALPH JAMES AND JANICE JAMES ARE MARRIED. TRUSTEES DAVID THURSTON AND ROSEMARIE THURSTON ARE MARRIED. TRUSTEES FRED POSES AND NANCY POSES ARE MARRIED.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION'S DIRECTOR OF FINANCE AND TREASURER REVIEW A DRAFT OF THE FORM 990, WHICH IS PREPARED BY THE ORGANIZATION'S INDEPENDENT ACCOUNTANTS. ANY RESULTANT COMMENTS AND CHANGES ARE INCORPORATED INTO THE FORM BY THE INDEPENDENT ACCOUNTANTS. A FINAL VERSION OF THE FORM 990 IS THEN PROVIDED TO EACH MEMBER OF THE BOARD OF TRUSTEES PRIOR TO ITS FILING WITH THE IRS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: ALL OFFICERS AND TRUSTEES OF THE ORGANIZATION ARE REQUIRED TO FILE A STATEMENT ON AN ANNUAL BASIS DISCLOSING ANY POTENTIAL INTERESTS THAT COULD GIVE RISE TO CONFLICTS. THESE STATEMENTS ARE COMPLETED AT THE BEGINNING OF EACH FISCAL YEAR AND ARE EVALUATED BY THE OFFICERS OF THE ORGANIZATION. INDIVIDUALS WITH POTENTIAL CONFLICTS OF INTEREST ARE PROHIBITED FROM PARTICIPATING IN ANY DELIBERATIONS OR DECISIONS THAT MAY BE EFFECTED BY A POTENTIAL CONFLICT OF INTEREST.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15A
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: COMPENSATION OF THE HEAD OF SCHOOL IS REVIEWED ON AN ANNUAL BASIS IN CONNECTION WITH THE ORGANIZATION'S BUDGETING PROCESS. THE BOARD OF TRUSTEES, WITH THE SUPPORT OF AN INDEPENDENT COMPENSATION CONSULTANT, REVIEWS AND APPROVES THE COMPENSATION OF THE HEAD OF SCHOOL USING DATA FOR COMPARABLE ORGANIZATIONS. SUCH DELIBERATIONS AND DECISIONS ARE RECORDED IN THE MEETING MINUTES.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION'S GOVERNING DOCUMENTS AND AUDITED FINANCIAL STATEMENTS ARE AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC VIA THE WEBSITES OF CERTAIN STATE REGULATORY AGENCIES AS WELL AS UPON REQUEST. THE CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY IS AVAILABLE UPON REQUEST.
